name: Purple Qi from the East
desc: Heavenly spiritual qi is abundant, cultivators' cultivation speed greatly increases, and the desire to cultivate improves

name: Year of Golden Malice
desc: Golden malice fills the world with solemnity, cultivators are more likely to be bloodthirsty and attack each other

name: Era of Wood Spirit
desc: Wood virtue nourishes with vitality, harvesting yields double and injuries heal extremely fast, ideal for searching for heavenly materials and earthly treasures everywhere

name: Age of Water Virtue
desc: Water element flows without hindrance, cultivation efficiency and speed both improve, making it a great time for secluded cultivation

name: Era of Fire Calamity
desc: Heavenly fire burns and calamity arrives, combat power surges but lifespan drains, one should decide battles quickly to fight for life against heaven

name: World of Thick Earth
desc: Earth virtue is thick and carries all things, the body is resilient and blood qi is full, allowing one to face strong enemies without fear

name: Five Elements Chaos
desc: Five elements are out of order and heaven and earth are in chaos, conventional cultivation yields half the result with twice the effort, but bottlenecks loosen and it is suitable to attempt breakthroughs

name: Heavenly Dao Balance
desc: Heavenly Dao manifests to take from those who have too much and give to those who have too little, high-level cultivators' progress is hindered, low-level cultivators should seize the opportunity to catch up

name: Calamity Approaches
desc: Calamity arrives and hostility spreads, although combat power surges, fortune is shallow, one should act cautiously as if walking on thin ice

name: Qi Recovery
desc: Heaven and earth spiritual qi erupts and recovers, cultivation progress advances rapidly, all things compete to grow, suitable for full effort in progress

name: Qi Depletion
desc: Spiritual qi is depleted and the Dharma-ending age approaches, cultivation is like rowing against the current, suitable for saving resources and stabilizing the Dao heart

name: Rise of the Demonic Path
desc: Demonic qi towers and the evil path prospers, demonic cultivators are like fish in water, righteous cultivators should avoid their edge and focus on accumulation

name: Righteous Spirit
desc: Innocent righteous spirit suppresses evil, righteous cultivators are helped as if by gods, demonic cultivators should keep a low profile to avoid bad luck

name: Divine Weapon Birth
desc: Divine weapons have spirits and all weapons chime, weapon proficiency improves extremely fast, suitable for practicing martial arts and sharpening the edge

name: Yin-Yang Harmony
desc: Yin and Yang harmonize and heaven and earth unite, mutual complement leads to rapid progress, most suitable for finding a Dao companion to share the joy of dual cultivation

name: Killing Calamity Descends
desc: Blood light reaches the sky and the intent to kill is hard to suppress, although killing power greatly increases, opportunities are cut off, suitable for taking the initiative to prove the Dao through killing

name: Era of Peace
desc: The world is at peace and all things are tranquil, although bitter cultivation is slow, opportunities arise frequently, suitable for traveling the world to find encounters

name: Blessed by Luck
effects: [{when: 'any(p.key == "CHILD_OF_FORTUNE" for p in avatar.personas)', extra_cultivate_exp: 25, extra_fortune_probability: 0.005}]
desc: Favored by destiny and centered by luck, everything goes well for the chosen one, ordinary people can only look up and not force it

name: Blood Moon in the Sky
desc: The blood moon hangs high and hearts are restless, combat power is strong but quiet cultivation is difficult, suitable for plundering resources through battle

name: Gate of Ascension
desc: The heavenly gate opens wide and the Great Dao manifests, comprehension and cultivation are helped as if by gods, it is the time to impact realms and ascend to immortality

name: Law Manifestation
desc: Heaven and earth laws are clearly touchable, bottlenecks are like paper that can be pierced with a touch, do not miss this heaven-sent opportunity for breakthrough

name: Spacetime Turbulence
desc: Spacetime is out of order and strange phenomena frequently occur, dangerous places also hide supreme opportunities, suitable for seeking wealth in danger and exploring the unknown
